scenes.name: Alma
scenes.text: Hey Jill ! How are you doing tonight my dear?

scenes.name: Jill
scenes.text: Hey Alma. Do you like pizza..?

scenes.name: Jill
scenes.text: Because I have a lot of them in the store right now.

scenes.name: Jill
scenes.text: And I won't be eating them.

scenes.name: Alma
scenes.text: Ah, yes I do! But are you sure? Because Akai sucks a lot.

scenes.name: Jill
scenes.text: Don't worry about it. He's just a piece of trash.
